projectAuthor: Philippine Science High School Main Campus

content.title: Description
content.text: Use sound to determine the distance of various objects from the ultrasonic sensor. This is the same system used in automobiles to avoid collisions.

content.title: Materials
text: Intel Galileo with ultrasonic transmitter and receiver module and temperature sensor
Various objects of different sizes, shapes, surface texture (e.g. smooth vs. velvet), and materials (e.g. concrete vs. sponge)

content.title: Author
content.text: Jason Alcarez, Kelvin Bartilad, Ralph Benedict Bucao
